channel.title: Girls with Deep Pockets
channel.description: Recent content on Girls with Deep Pockets
channel.copyright: Stephanie Locke. Site made using [Hugo](//gohugo.io) and the [Icarus](https://github.com/digitalcraftsman/hugo-icarus-theme) theme.

item.title: Articles worth reading (1st Nov 2016)
item.description:
It’s been fantastic to see that there’s actually a huge proportion of women out there demanding pockets. As a result, there’s been some nifty articles on the web that are well worth reading.

  • Our Fave Places: Line Cut Supply Article interviewing a Sheffield, UK based designer of womens workwear. Aimee insists on pocket in all her designs!
  • Hello Giggles: 11 stages of fake pockets being the worst fashion LIE of all time Gif’s ahoy!
  • Smarter Travel: 10 Travel-Friendly Dresses with Pockets A neat showcase of different dresses that have pockets and will travel
  • Odyssey: A Declaration of War on Fake Pockets A fun piece on how horrible fake pockets are
